publications.title: Antitrust Regulatory Gap in IndiGo Airlines 2025 Fiasco : Lessons from the US and EU
publications.tldr: India’s aviation market is highly concentrated, with IndiGo’s dominance and a December 2025 crisis exposing weaknesses in the country’s competition law framework.Comparing India’s restrained approach with U.S. and EU enforcement, the paper argues for stronger proactive safeguards to protect consumer welfare in essential infrastructure sectors.
